text: RTP Internacional (RTPi) is a Portuguese free-to-air television channel owned and operated by state-owned public broadcaster Rádio e Televisão de Portugal. ==Other websites== * *RTP Internacional Live Stream on RTP Play Category:Macau Category:1992 establishments in Asia Category:Television channels in North America Category:Television channels in Europe Category:Television channels in South America Category:Television channels in Asia
